title: 3.2 Earning a livelihood, Part  2 - On purpose and discipline
description:
We continue talking about livelihood within the Islamic economic paradigm.

We also look at trade as a mechanism for earning and provisioning livelihood for the common good.

In addition, we extend the money mastery analogy to include a component of discipline that safeguards from corruption while working for a livelihood.

Topics: piety, taqwa, zuhd, trade, riba, economy, prudence, abstinence, money, wealth, blessings.

Don’t forget to rate our podcast *5 stars* wherever you listen to us!
